metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Yellow Giant is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Yellow Giant has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Major, D♭ Major, A♯ Phrygian,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
